If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
This seems to be due to blocking a very popular tracker that can't be unblocked in the main filter. Please add a rule 
`@@||rum.browser-intake-datadoghq.com^`
to the DNS filter user rules.
